summary: "Pocahontas" is a 1995 Disney animated movie about the real-life Native American woman and her meeting with English colonist John Smith. The film tells a love story and shows Pocahontas saving Smith's life. It has beautiful animation, songs, and voices by actors like Irene Bedard and Mel Gibson. Though it changed some history, it was popular and won two Academy Awards. The movie inspired Disney to create more strong female leads in future films.
title: Pocahontas (1995 film)
